text: This place deserves 5 stars. The response from the customer service team was very prompt and they went above and beyond to get me my test results really quickly. Dr Tan is also very kind and non judgmental. He spent very long listening and addressing my concerns and truly went beyond the extra mile. Bedside manners are commendable. Highly recommend Dr Tan.

The doc at the clinic is very patience, professional and kind. Had a pleasant experience at the clinic. Dr tan is very polite and will go extra mile..
Highly recommended. Lastly, the customer service at triage care is super helpful too.

They are very prompt in their responses, making appointments seamlessly.
Clinic is clean, comfy and spacious
Dr Tan is very friendly and can articulate in layman terms, making my visits very comfortable.

Was warmly welcomed and like the overall experience 😋😋😋 haven’t met the doc yet but will an add after😋😋😋

Add on: after consulting Dr Tan, I found that he is very kind, fun to talk to and also helps to answer my questions and clear my doubts. Honestly I couldn’t do it by myself without Wonderhealth screening services 😭😭😭😭❤️❤️❤️❤️

Doctor was very patient in listening to your worries. Clinic has a triage hotline who will allow you to ask queries before going down to the clinic. This gives patients a lot of assurance and more confidence. Thank you for the great healthcare coverage!
